Autotel's sound sculpt experiment

This is an unfinished piece, so some things are unreasonably complicated to do. There is no deleting modules either. Also be careful of not doing feedback loops!

rotator reverb1 delay drumpat drumpat2 filterTester

Try tweaking parameters.

To create, connect and disconnect things, you have to use the web console. Press "ctrl+shift+I" or "f12". Also some parameters can only be changed through the console.

There is a repo for this at
